alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:02AM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 5 inches, but higher amounts are possible across the northern Laramie Valley and northern Laramie county. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Laramie Valley and Central Laramie County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rapid ground blizzard conditions may develop that will drop visibility quickly down to less than a quarter mile.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
